theme: भक्ति - जहाँ एकाग्रता हो वहाँ बैठो कोई विशेष जगह की आवश्यकता नहीं है

terms.Meaning: Where there is one: pointedness, there is no distinction or difference.
terms.Explanation: This verse from the Brahma: pointed concentration in spiritual practice. It means that when the mind is completely focused and concentrated on a particular object, there is no room for any differences or distinctions. In this state of intense concentration, one experiences a state of unity and non-duality, where all boundaries and divisions are transcended. This verse suggests that the path to spiritual realization involves attaining a state of focused awareness and transcending all dualities and differences.
